title: Cuban Chicharrones de Pollo
summary: If you have roughly 45 minutes to spend in the kitchen, Cuban Chicharrones de Pollo might be a great dairy free recipe to try. This recipe makes 6 servings with 225 calories, 18g of protein, and 5g of fat each. For $1.53 per serving, this recipe covers 15% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Head to the store and pick up light rum, vegetable oil, juice of lime, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the lime wedges you could follow this main course with the Best Lime Tart as a dessert. Plenty of people made this recipe, and 178 would say it hit the spot. It works well as a main course. It is brought to you by Jo Cooks. With a spoonacular score of 65%, this dish is pretty good. Try Chicharrones De Pollo, Chicharrones Guisados (Stewed Fried Pork Rinds), and Cuban Sandwiches and Cuban Sliders for similar recipes.
